content.rendered:
Directed by Sriram Raghavan

Written by Arijit Biswas. Yogesh Chandekar. Sriram Raghavan. Hemanth M. Rao. Pooja Ladha Surti. Olivier Treiner

Cast Tabu (Simi Sinha). Ayushmann Khurrana (Akash). Radhika Apte (Sophie). Anil Dhawan (Pramod Sinha). Manav Vij (DSP Manohar Jawanda). Zakir Hussain (Dr. Swami). Ashwini Kalsekar (Rasika Jawanda). Chhaya Kadam (Saroja). Pawan Singh (Murli). Rashmi Agdekar (Daani Sinha). Kabir Sajid Shaikh (Bandu (as Kabir Sajid)). Gopal Singh (Sub-inspector Paresh K.). Mahesh Rale (Sub-inspector P. Kamdar). Mohini Kewalramani (Mrs. D’Sa). Franco Vaz (Franco). Surabhi Sharma (TV Reporter). Jaydutt Vyas (Alurkar). Abhishek Shukla (Hunter). Pratik Nandkumar More (Surya). Yogesh Chandekar (Kitchen Guy At Franco’s). Saumin Patel (Sketch Artist at Franco’s). Pankaj Poal (Security Guard at Franco’s). Hera Sajid (Nurse with Dr. Swami). Klaudia (Waitress at London Cafe). Vishal Bajaj (Man In The Bus). Akash Soni (Simi’s Assistant). Nikitasha Kapoor (Subway Waitress). Rahul Gajjal (Blind Man 1). Hemendra Pratap Singh (Blind Man 2). Abhishek Anand (Criminal in Police Station (as Abhishek Kumar)). Swapnil Sawant (Driver At Traffic Signal). Parvez Fazal Khan (Interrogator). Suchitra Mohite (Doctor At Emergency Ward). Danny Wilson (Arab Sheikh). Jagdish Nandi (Man at Tea Stall). Mani (Rani the Cat)

Language Hindi. English

Producers Bobby Adhale. Vishal Bajaj. Vicky Bhatia. Amit J. Chaudhary. Kewal Garg. Hetvi Karia. Ashish Kathpal. Kanchan Marathe. Pratik Nandkumar More. Gaurav Nanda. Dikssha Jyote Routray. Sanjay Routray. Sharda Singh. Archana Tamboskar. Ashok Vashodia. Maciej Zemojcin

Production Matchbox Picture. Viacom18 Motion Picture
